bearish.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a bearish market is one where the prices of shares are decreasing
bearish.translation[0].definitions[1].de: someone who is bearish expects the price of business shares to go down
bearish.translation[1].definitions[0].de: expecting prices on a financial market to fall or economic activity to slow down
